name.japanese: リュリュの実 モデル：アロサウルス
name.romanized: Ryu Ryu no Mi, Moderu: Arosaurusu

description: An Ancient Zoan-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to transform into an allosaurus, a carnivorous dinosaur species. The fruit grants enhanced strength, speed, and durability in both hybrid and full beast forms.

users.circumstances: X Drake consumed this fruit at some point before becoming a pirate

abilityReveals.description: Drake transforms into his dinosaur form to prepare for battle against Scotch.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Drake uses this form to deliberately challenge Kaido's subordinate Scotch on the winter island.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim

strengths.strength: Enhanced physical abilities in dinosaur form
strengths.description: The allosaurus form grants tremendous strength and combat capabilities suitable for challenging powerful opponents.
